title: Bratislava City Centre Refined Retreat near Grassalkovich Palace
description: Near Grassalkovich Palace and boasting Danube River views, Crowne Plaza Bratislava, an IHG Hotel, is a refined refuge in the heart of this heritage city. Fresh! restaurant makes healthy choices easy with gluten-free a la carte options on their international menu and the onsite fitness centre is sure to invigorate your body and mind. As evening approaches, explore the dynamic neighbourhood of Bratislava's Old Town or enjoy a refined drink in comfort from the picturesque summer terrace.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Bratislava, an IHG Hotel
